biotools.summary: Phenomics of yeast Mutants (PhenoM): contains quantitative measurements of 1,909,914 cells and 78,194 morphological images for 775 temperature-sensitive mutants spanning 491 different essential genes in permissive temperature (26 C) and restrictive temperature (32 C).
